description: Two storey side extension with mansard roof to provide accommodation in the roof space incorporating side and rear dormer windows; single storey rear and rear/side infill extension (following removal of existing garage and outbuilding); and associated internal and external alterations incorporating windows facing Hillcrest Road
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): HR/ND/00 Location Plan; HR/ND/01 Block Plan; HR/ND/02 Existing Ground Floor & Cellar Plan; HR/ND/03 Existing First Floor & Second Floor Plan; HR/ND/04 Existing Roof Plan; HR/ND/05 Existing Front & Side Elevations; HR/ND/06 Existing Rear & Side Elevations; HR/ND/07 Rev A Proposed Ground Floor & Landscape Plan; HR/ND/08 Rev A Proposed First Floor Plan; HR/ND/09 Rev A Proposed Second Floor Plan; HR/ND/10 Rev A Proposed Roof Plan; HR/ND/11 Rev B Proposed Front & Side Elevations; HR/ND/12 Rev A Proposed Rear & Side Elevations; Design and Access Statement prepared by New Designs dated July 2022.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
